abstract: 'I asked him to do the same thing that has happened to him, claim me out of it.'
description: James Ross Irvine and his brother were both involved in significant battles in Papua New Guinea in World War II. With a stoic sensibility and grim humour, Irvine relates the story of the last time he saw his brother before he was killed in battle.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001970; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Sale veterans] [June 2010]; Active; 2010
